item.title: about
item.description:
Short Bio.

Yuan Jiang is pursuing his graduate study, supervised by Dr. Wei Shen, at the School of Communication and Information Engineering, Shanghai University. His research interests include computer vision, pattern recognition, machine learning and deep learning. Here is the CV.
